data.title: Brunch
data.text: I had hash browns and eggs with coffee. And my partner had a French dip with fries. Everything was very good and the waitress very attentive. It was a constant filling of my coffee. As most Greek restaurants the prices are reasonable. It was a Sunday mid morning, but we were seated immediately.

data.title: Great food and service
data.text: Stayed in Milwaukee for a month and had the pleasure of dinning at Pegasus several times. There menu choices are very diverse and prices great for service and potions. Look forward to another visit so we can enjoy another visit to Pegasus.

data.title: Big portions and great service
data.text: An old-fashioned family owned diner with mainly american menu and a few Greek dished to highlight it. The Athenian style chicken breasts with spinach pie was really very good -huge portion for just one person.  The stuff is friendly and they always have a great suggestion. I've been there breakfast, lunch and dinner and never disappointed. The place is located just across the street from the State Fair Park and the service might be slower during the Fair.

data.title: Good Gyro Combo
data.text: Milwaukee has numerous Greek family restaurants with a mainly American menu with some Greek dishes. Omega is probably the most famous of these, but the Pegasus is another good one. The gyro plate lunch special at about $8 is a great deal and includes soup. I give it 4 stars for slow service as the table next to us got their food before us even though they arrived after us, a pet peeve of mine.

data.title: Pretty mediocre.
data.text: Breakfast was poor.  Belgian waffle was dense and dry.  Other food was OK.  Service was not very friendly and down right rude at check out.

data.title: old style 24 hour family restaurant
data.text:
We stopped at this family restaurant about nine on a Sunday nite. We were just going to have salads, but ended up having a couple of their Greek dinners. Food was just okay. Our large portioned dinners included a salad, side, and dessert for a modest price. Restaurant was very clean and decorated in an odd modern style.  Service was friendly and efficient. 
Average food would likely have us choose another restaurant next time. Not bad, but I'm sure we could easily find better.

data.title: Great food, friendly staff
data.text: We've never been disappointed with a meal here.  It's also a great place to meet up with friends.  The senior specials are perfectly portioned and reasonably priced -- and dessert is included.  The location is convenient, right across from State Fair Park.

data.title: A nice place for lunch.
data.text: I went here for lunch. It has a quite atmosphere. It clearly serves a more elderly crowd, but everyone was very polite. The food was decent. I had a gyro, which had large portions. It was a little bland, but that might just be my preference. The cost of the meal was more than for, so it is defiantly a decent place for lunch.

data.title: 24 hour spot
data.text:
While in Milwaukee, we stayed in the vicinity of Pegagus so decided to stop for breakfast. The place was busy, and the atmosphere was upbeat. It appeared that many guests were frequent visitors as they called the waitresses by name. Our waitress was engaging and attentive. 
The meal was less than appetizing. I ordered an omelette. It was stuffed with jalapenos; but they were were placed inside in huge chunks. I picked them out. The hash browns were unevenly cooked. Part of the serving was burnt while another part was under-cooked. My spouse ordered the pancakes with sausage. The pancakes were cooked to perfection, but the sausage had a very weird taste. We left them on the plate.
The hot chocolate was tasty, filled to the brim with whipped cream.
The locals seemed to like Pegasus...

data.title: Greek twenty-four hour diner
data.text: Classic Greek twenty-four hour diner. Food was very good, service was good and food came out quickly. Has some Greek dishes on the back of the menu along with classic diner food and breakfast all day. Place did not disappoint.

data.title: Greek Diner
data.text:
I'm in town once a year; this is almost a daily stop for my group.  Never a wait when I have gone.  Quick friendly service.
From breakfast to dessert.  Great homey dining.  Seniors specials.  Try their cakes!
They even serve cocktails, reminiscent of early 70's vibes.

data.title: great menu, many choices, yummy food
data.text:
We went to Pegasus with a group of 4 adults and 3 children.  Everything looks good so it's hard to choose just one thing!  Even the child menu had great selection.  From burgers to spaghetti to stuffed pork chops or jambalaya... all tasted great!  Then to top it off, most include a choice of desserts.  
Love this place!

data.title: jersey Style Diner in Wisconsin
data.text: I visited this local restaurant twice for breakfast.  The service was great, the food was delicious and the price was very reasonable (Breakfast for one cost $8,00)

data.title: Horrible
data.text: Unfriendly service, hardly paid attention to our table. Ate here while visiting family. Food was ok. Service sucked. Dont recommend this place to anyone.

data.title: Good food, good service, good value.
data.text: Four of us had breakfast there on a Sunday. All our orders were correct, the portions were generous, and the prices reasonable. Service was quick and waitress was pleasant.

data.title: Great Food Great Value
data.text: This place has a large menu. There's something for everyone. Breakfast anytime. Senior menu. Specials.  Dinners include soup or salad, vegetable, potato, bread basket, and desert. Food is always hot, and tasty and service is great.

data.title: Great for After Bar Time
data.text: This place is great if you want an economical breakfast early in the morning but also has great dinner specials.  The waitstaff is always super friendly, the service is fast and you get tons of food.  Right across from Wisconsin State Fair Park.

data.title: Will be back.
data.text: I came here with a coworker. I had a gyros and he a BLT. Both delicious. Also had Italian wedding soup. Also very tasty. Good service and like most Greek owned restaurants, many selections on the menu.

data.title: good food
data.text: we usually go for a big breakfast on sundays. not much wait time. very fast for getting the food to you. good portion size. we have also done lunch and dinner. good selection to chose from.

data.title: Safe & satisfying bet
data.text: This place is exceptional! Clean, fresh, and attractive. Value and attention to detail notable. The classic Greek family run restaurant on steroids (matriarch on Sunday a weak link)! Huge variety. Pleasant and attentive servers. You will go home hungry only if you take half of your meal home. If I had to pick just one restaurant in the State Fair Park area to eat at everyday of the year, this would be it. Thank you Pegasus! Oh yeah, the food is tasty too!
